code: import{message}from"antd";import{basePath,apiVersion}from"./config";export function loginApi(data){var url="".concat(basePath,"/").concat(apiVersion,"/login");var params={method:"POST",body:JSON.stringify(data),headers:{"Content-type":"application/json"}};return fetch(url,params).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(result){if(result.user){return{ok:true,mesagge:"Usuario creado con exito"};}return{ok:false,message:result.message};}).catch(function(err){return{ok:false,message:err.message};});}export function signInApi(data){var url="".concat(basePath,"/").concat(apiVersion,"/sign-in");var params={method:"POST",body:JSON.stringify(data),headers:{"Content-type":"application/json"}};return fetch(url,params).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(result){return result;}).catch(function(err){return err.message;});}export function getUsersApi(token){var url="".concat(basePath,"/").concat(apiVersion,"/users");var params={method:"GET",headers:{"Content-type":"application/json",Authorization:token}};return fetch(url,params).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(result){return result;}).catch(function(err){return err.message;});}export function getUsersActiveApi(token,status){var url="".concat(basePath,"/").concat(apiVersion,"/users-active?active=").concat(status);var params={method:"GET",headers:{"Content-type":"application/json",Authorization:token}};return fetch(url,params).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(result){return result;}).catch(function(err){return err.message;});}export function uploadAvatarApi(token,avatar,userId){var url="".concat(basePath,"/").concat(apiVersion,"/upload-avatar/").concat(userId);var formData=new FormData();formData.append("avatar",avatar,avatar.name);var params={method:"PUT",body:formData,headers:{Authorization:token}};return fetch(url,params).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(result){return result;}).catch(function(err){return err.message;});}export function getAvatarApi(avatarName){var url="".concat(basePath,"/").concat(apiVersion,"/get-avatar/").concat(avatarName);return fetch(url).then(function(response){return response.url;}).catch(function(err){return err.message;});}export function updateUserApi(token,user,idUser){var url="".concat(basePath,"/").concat(apiVersion,"/update-user/").concat(idUser);var params={method:"PUT",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:token},body:JSON.stringify(user)};return fetch(url,params).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(result){return result;}).catch(function(err){return err.message;});}export function activateUserApi(token,idUser,status){var url="".concat(basePath,"/").concat(apiVersion,"/activate-user/").concat(idUser);var params={method:"PUT",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:token},body:JSON.stringify({active:status})};return fetch(url,params).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(result){return result.message;}).catch(function(err){return err.message;});}export function deleteUserApi(token,idUser){var url="".concat(basePath,"/").concat(apiVersion,"/user-delete/").concat(idUser);var params={method:"DELETE",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:token}};return fetch(url,params).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(result){return result.message;}).catch(function(err){return err.message;});}export function singUpAdminApi(token,data){var url="".concat(basePath,"/").concat(apiVersion,"/sing-up-admin");var response.json();}).then(function(result){return result.message;}).catch(function(err){return err.message;});}
